headline: GE Vernova declares third quarter 2025 dividend
summary: CAMBRIDGE, Mass., June 23, 2025--GE Vernova (NYSE: GEV) today announced that its Board of Directors has declared a $0.25 per share quarterly dividend. The quarterly dividend will be payable on August 18, 2025, to shareholders of record as of July 21, 2025.
